name: Veez Mega Bot
description: veez music mega allow you to stream music trought the telegram voice chat feature.

SESSION_NAME1.description: fill with the pyrogram session string from account 1

SESSION_NAME2.description: fill with the pyrogram session string from account 2

OWNER_ID.description: fill with your telegram id as the owner of the bot

ASS_ID.description: fill with telegram id of account 1

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: create a private group and get the group id, add your bot as admin to the group too

assnumber.description: just fill 2 you can fill 1 too

SUDO_USERS.description: fill with the user id who can access all function in your bot (separate with space).

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram

MONGO_DB_URI2.description: fill with the mongodb url 1 get from mongodb.cloud.com (don't use mine below !)

MONGO_DB_URI.description: fill with the mongodb url 2 get from mongodb.cloud.com (don't use mine below !)
